title: The Kraken's Curse
starting_description: You've discovered a mysterious chest lodged within the skeletal remains of a sunken galleon.  Three mechanisms guard its secrets â€“ each a relic of the Kraken's wrath.

paths.description: A pressure gauge marked with Roman numerals shows the depths.  Beside it is a set of colored buttons.
paths.hint: The deepest part of the ocean is known as the hadal zone, measured in thousands of fathoms, which is typically represented by what number? //  The Kraken's blood is said to be the color of the deepest sea.
paths.death_text: The pressure gauge implodes, crushing the chest and its contents.  The Kraken claims its prize once more.

paths.description: A waterlogged book shows a map, but the location of the treasure is hidden.  A distance sensor sits nearby.
paths.hint: Find the page number indicating the treasure on the map, which corresponds to a specific depth. //  To see the hidden message, keep the log concealed from the light.
paths.death_text: The Kraken's ink-like venom eats through the book, revealing nothing but empty pages.  The map's secret is lost.

paths.description: A rusty box with a single button and a picture-based rotary selector sits before you.  A carving of a siren suggests a song of destruction and salvation.
paths.hint: The siren's song lures sailors to their doom with the promise of riches. What item represents the promise of gold? // This particular siren only responds to the red hue of blood.
paths.death_text: A venomous sea snake is released from a hidden compartment. Its bite seals your fate, leaving the chest untouched.
